ETYMOLOGY: Clipping of influenza, from Italian (neuter) influenza 'influence', originally referring to celestial influence believed to cause the disease.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A common, highly contagious viral infection of the respiratory passages causing fever, severe aching, and catarrh (inflammation of mucous membranes).
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种常见且传染性极强的呼吸道病毒感染，通常引起发烧、全身酸痛和卡他性炎症（如流鼻水、咳嗽）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I came down with the flu and had to take a week off work.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我得了流感，不得不请了一周的病假。
